choices: Throw the alarm clock at the wall out of frustration.
As calmly as possible, click off the alarm and climb out of bed.
1.content: You wake up to that way too familiar screech of your 30-year old hand-me-down alarm clock that you got as a birthday present from your more than half deaf grandfather. The sun has decided to chose today to shine directly upon your left eye as you roll over. You find that your dog has decided to leave you a "present" at the foot of your bed. And that dream you had last night of being attacked by a wild animal, you realize, was actually your cat having a skytzophranic spaz attack on your right arm, which is still bleeding. Your pillow has burrowed into the crack between the bed and the wall,creating a horrible crick in your neck.You...

You then climb over the broken shards of plastic and glass and quickly throw on some clothes. You walk towards the stairs, and trip. As you tumble end over end down the stairs your head smacks off the wall, your left arm is punctured by a toy your little brother left on the floor, and you hit the hardwood floor of the living room, which is freezing cold.

Your head knocks over the garbage can flinging 4 days worth of god only knows what all over you and the kitchen floor. info.brief_description: Rock bottom is thought to be the worst place to be...start diggin'.
info.description:
This is a story about the worst day of your life, a chance to torment yourself, to see just how bad you can make a single day.

Note for added chapters: Remember, You are the target. This is a story whose soul purpose is to torment you (the reader). However, Please don't kill yourself, permenatly dibilitate or disfigure beyond recognition. If it helps, picture yourself in someone else's shoes. Preferably someone who annoy's you. And try to keep the foul language to a minimum, you can refer to it all you want, just try not to say it directly.

This is also a story to inspire, becuase no matter how bad the day seems...it could always be worse.
